name: Saving kittens beta!!!
description:
Move your mouse, control the basket to catch falling kitties!

Thug-life kitties give 3 x amount of points!

Nurse kitties give + 1 lives!

IceShard: slow all kitties and items for 8 seconds.

Avoid bomb kitties, they give - 5 lives! 

Avoid fire bottle bomb: double point decrements in 8 seconds.

Stay focus and reach the highest score!

Please give me feedback for any kind of bugs, graphic problems, etc. Thank you very much!
